name: HSP_GUAR_STMT_HX
description: This table contains hospital guarantor statement history information.

columns.name: GUAR_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STMT_HX_HBP_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the statement history print record.

columns.name: STMT_FLWUP_LEVEL
columns.description: This column stores the statement follow-up level.

columns.name: STMT_DATE
columns.description: The date of the statement or detail bill.

columns.name: STMT_BATCH_DATE
columns.description: statement batch date

columns.name: STMT_FORM
columns.description: The form on which this statement or detail bill was sent.

columns.name: STMT_PROR_PART
columns.description: This column stores the proration part amount from the statement.

columns.name: STMT_PREV_BALANCE
columns.description: statement previous balance amt

columns.name: STMT_NEW_CHGS
columns.description: This column stores the statement new charge amount.

columns.name: STMT_NEW_PMTS
columns.description: This column stores the statement new payment amount.

columns.name: STMT_NEW_ADJS
columns.description: This column stores the statement new adjustment amount.

columns.name: STMT_AMOUNT_DUE
columns.description: statement amount due

columns.name: STMT_TOT_CHGS
columns.description: statement total charges

columns.name: STMT_TOT_PMTS
columns.description: statement total payments

columns.name: STMT_TOT_ADJS
columns.description: statement total adjustments

columns.name: STMT_CUR_BALANCE
columns.description: statement current balance

columns.name: STMT_IS_DEMAND_YN
columns.description: This column indicates whether the statement is a demand statement.

columns.name: STMT_PREV_DUE
columns.description: Previous statement due amt

columns.name: STMT_PLAN_TOTAL
columns.description: This column stores the statement payment plan total amount.

columns.name: STMT_PLAN_BALANCE
columns.description: This column stores the statement payment plan balance.

columns.name: STMT_PLAN_MONTH
columns.description: This column stores the statement payment plan monthly amount.

columns.name: STMT_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the previous insurance balance for hospital billing statements.

columns.name: STMT_CUR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the hospital billing current insurance balance for hospital billing statements.

columns.name: STMT_SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The guarantor self-pay follow-up level for the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_IS_INFO_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the statement was informational for this statement. Y means informational, N means not informational, blank means not informational.

columns.name: STMT_EB_PRNT_ID
columns.description: Stores the link to the statement print (SBP) record.

columns.name: STMT_DVRY_MTD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores how the statement was delivered.

columns.name: STMT_FST_VW_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the date and time when this Hospital Billing statement was first viewed in MyChart by this guarantor. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: STMT_LST_VW_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the date and time when this Hospital Billing statement was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: STMT_PAPER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason why the statement was sent via paper.
entries: Paperless Billing is disabled for the service area
Forced to paper because of self-pay follow-up level
Forced to paper because of guarantor rule
Forced to paper because of hospital account rule
Financial Assistance Program Not Allowed In MyChart
Form is not allowed to be displayed in MyChart
Guarantor missing associated patient or MyChart account
Guarantor is not available in MyChart
No access to billing features in MyChart
MyChart tickler could not be sent
Professional billing letter not marked as Sent
Patient is not active on MyChart
Queued for printing based on estimate rule

columns.name: STMT_PRNT_INV_NUM
columns.description: This is the invoice number for the statement.

columns.name: INV_NUM_BASE
columns.description: This is the base for the invoice number.

columns.name: INV_NUM_SEQ
columns.description: This is the sequence for the invoice number.

columns.name: INV_NUM_ASGN_DT
columns.description: This is the date the statement print invoice number was assigned.

columns.name: STMT_HX_IS_MYC_NOTIF_YN
columns.description: Stores if the statement/detail bill notification was sent via MyChart.

columns.name: HB_STMTHX_CNTST_BAL
columns.description: Stores the contested balance on the statement.

columns.name: HB_STMT_HX_TOT_SCH
columns.description: The total amount of all scheduled payments on the statement.

columns.name: HB_STMT_HX_PAY_NOW
columns.description: The pay now amount on the statement. This is the amount due subtracted by the total scheduled payment amount.
